keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmap J
unmap K
map J nextTab
map K previousTab
unmap b
unmap B
map ا scrollLeft
map ت scrollDown
map ن scrollUp
map م scrollRight
map ظا scrollToLeft
map أ scrollToBottom
map لل scrollToTop
map ظم scrollToRight
map ة nextTab
map » previousTab
map ی scrollPageDown
map ع scrollPageUp
map ب LinkHints.activateMode
map إ LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map خ Vomnibar.activate
map ف Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map لث Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map لٍ Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map د performFind
map ٔ  performBackwardsFind
map آ goBack
map « goForward
map <a-پ> toggleMuteTab
map له focusInput
map لب nextFrame
map لإ mainFrame
map ط removeTab
map ٓ  restoreTab
map ٌ  moveTabToNewWindow
map لس toggleViewSource
searchEngines:
# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
ی: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
: https://start.duckduckgo.com/lite/?q=%s DuckDuckGo Lite
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
a: https://www.aparat.com/search/%s آپارات
ش: https://www.aparat.com/search/%s آپارات
